mapper.sql: select t1.*,t2.AREA_NAME ,t3.REGULATORY_LEVEL,t3.GRID_ID from T_ENTERPRISE_BASE t1 left join T_S_AREA t2 on t1.AREA_ID=t2.AREA_ID left join T_ENTERPRISE_SUPERVISION t3 on t1.ENTERPRISE_ID=t3.ENTERPRISE_ID left join T_RESPONSIBILITY_GRID t4 on t3.GRID_ID=t4.GRID_ID
mapper.select: select count(0) from T_ENTERPRISE_BASE t1 left join T_S_AREA t2 on t1.AREA_ID=t2.AREA_ID left join T_ENTERPRISE_SUPERVISION t3 on t1.ENTERPRISE_ID=t3.ENTERPRISE_ID left join T_RESPONSIBILITY_GRID t4 on t3.GRID_ID=t4.GRID_ID
mapper.sql: SELECT EB.* ,EC.CERTIFICATE_NO FROM T_ENTERPRISE_BASE EB LEFT JOIN T_ENTERPRISE_SUPERVISION ES ON ES.ENTERPRISE_ID=EB.ENTERPRISE_ID LEFT JOIN T_RESPONSIBILITY_GRID RG ON RG.GRID_ID=ES.GRID_ID LEFT JOIN T_ENTERPRISE_CERTIFICATE EC ON EC.ENTERPRISE_ID=EB.ENTERPRISE_ID AND EC.CERTIFICATE_TYPE=1
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM T_ENTERPRISE_BASE t1 LEFT JOIN T_ENTERPRISE_SUPERVISION t2 on t1.ENTERPRISE_ID=t2.ENTERPRISE_ID LEFT JOIN T_RESPONSIBILITY_GRID t3 ON t3.GRID_ID=t2.GRID_ID where t1.ENTERPRISE_STATUS=3 and t3.MONITORS in( SELECT PERSONNEL_ID FROM T_PERSONNEL_THREE WHERE USER_ID=#{userId} and PERSONNEL_STATUS=1)

SELECT t1.ENTERPRISE_ID enterpriseId, t1.ENTERPRISE_NAME enterpriseName,t1.REGISTER_DATE registerDate,t1.REGISTER_ADDRESS registerAddress, t1.REGISTERED_CAPITAL registeredCapital, t1.LATITUDE latitude,t1.LONGITUDE longitude,t1.PRODUCTION_ADDRESS productionAddress,t1.ORGANIZING_INSTITUTION_BAR_CODE organizingInstitutionBarCode FROM T_ENTERPRISE_BASE t1 LEFT JOIN T_ENTERPRISE_SUPERVISION t2 on t1.ENTERPRISE_ID=t2.ENTERPRISE_ID LEFT JOIN T_RESPONSIBILITY_GRID t3 ON t3.GRID_ID=t2.GRID_ID where t1.ENTERPRISE_STATUS=3 and t3.MONITORS in( SELECT PERSONNEL_ID FROM T_PERSONNEL_THREE WHERE USER_ID=#{userId} and PERSONNEL_STATUS=1)

SELECT count( * ) total, t1.SUBJECT_CLASSIFICATION subjectClassification FROM T_ENTERPRISE_BASE t1 LEFT JOIN T_ENTERPRISE_SUPERVISION t2 ON t1.ENTERPRISE_ID = t2.ENTERPRISE_ID WHERE t1.ENTERPRISE_STATUS = 3 AND t2.GRID_ID = #{gridId} GROUP BY t1.SUBJECT_CLASSIFICATION
